casebody.data:
Daniella VALLEJO; and Angelina Vallejo, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR The COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable William D. Kephart, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Marta Nevinger, Real Party in Interest. No. 76368 Supreme Court of Nevada. September 14, 2018

DENIED.
